text: @DerbyshireRCT @DerbyshireFRS @EnvAgency It's time that environmental pollution in whatever form was taken far more seriously. This sort of thing needs a fine hefty enough to make the sort of scum that carry out out think twice before doing so.

@JamesBevanEA @EmmaHowardBoyd @EnvAgency Please please stop your plans to destroy the countryside and pollute our air. More than ever we need our green space and environment. You are determined to destroy these with the help of big business. So sad.

@EmmaHowardBoyd @RishiSunak @EnvAgency @GFI_green @IIGCCnews @Grantham_IC @ImpactInvInst @COP26 @GRI_LSE @DefraGovUK As YOU, at the Environment Agency, needlessly and potentially maliciously facilitate the building of a waste incinerator that will generate over 600,000 tonnes of CO2 per year, you have NO RIGHT to then present yourself  constantly to the media with such green credentials.

entity.name: Great Canal Journeys
entity.description: Prunella Scales and Timothy West embark on canal journeys together, traversing the canals of the UK, Europe, and the rest of the world by canal barge and narrowboat. Their trips take them along many scenic waterways, including ancient routes followed by the Vikings in Sweden, the windmills along the canals near Amsterdam, and the route once taken by Casanova in Venice. Along the way they interact with interesting characters, taste regional dishes and explore the sights around the canals. Sheila Hancock and Gyles Brandreth host the twelfth season.
